definition: to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: He breaketh in pieces the strong together with the weak for He regardeth not any man.
sentences.chinese: 他把强者与弱者一同化为齑粉，因为他目中无人。

sentences.english: It's not that I don't care about people, I am just very focused on task.
sentences.chinese: 可我并非目中无人，我只是过于关注这件事。

sentences.english: Painfully stylish with a permanent snooty look on their face?
sentences.chinese: 永远令人痛苦地挂着一副目中无人的时髦相？

sentences.english: The thief said he saw nobody but the gold.
sentences.chinese: 那贼人说他目中无人，只有黄金。

sentences.english: He thought too much of himself and was getting too big for his boots, though he kept his thoughts to himself.
sentences.chinese: 他少年得志，目中无人，不过没有表露出来。

sentences.english: For the third time the snooted matron totally ignored him.
sentences.chinese: 目中无人的女霸王第三次完全不理睬他。

definition: the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
to think of oneself as terrific (idiom); arrogant
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
